title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other LLMs locally with a single command-line tool and REST API.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, embed, pull and manage local models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node, Deno, Bun and browsers via fetch.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use Ollama models as LLMs or chat models in chains, agents and RAG pipelines.

title: llama-index-integrations/llama-index-llms-ollama
summary: LlamaIndex LLM integration for Ollama; plug local models into retrieval-augmented generation apps.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama; markdown, code highlighting, model management, multi-user.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI chat client for Ollama with syntax highlighting, conversation save/load, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: GitHub Copilot-style VS Code extension that uses local Ollama models for inline code suggestions.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and horizontal pod autoscaling.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official container images (CPU & GPU) for Ollama with one-line docker run commands.

title: ollama-chatbot-ui
summary: Next.js chatbot UI for Ollama featuring streaming, theming, and mobile-responsive layout.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB to chat with local PDFs.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with Spring Boot starters and reactive streaming support.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Rust crate providing async/sync bindings to the Ollama REST API with serde models.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET library and CLI for Ollama with chat, embeddings, and model management; NuGet: OllamaSharp.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models using slash commands.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to summarize notes, brainstorm ideas, and Q&A using an Ollama backend.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.0 integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-slackbot
summary: Slack Bolt bot that streams Ollama responses in threads with per-channel model selection.

title: ollama-models
summary: Community-curated Modelfile recipes for CodeLlama, WizardCoder, Zephyr, SQLCoder, etc.
